shortDescription: Located in Downtown Las Vegas, this hostel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Little White Wedding Chapel and Las Vegas Premium Outlets. Las Vegas Convention Center and Fashion Show Mall are also within 3 mi (5 km).

hotelRoomResponse.cancellationPolicy:
If you cancel or change your plans, please cancel your reservation in accordance with the hotel''s cancellation policies to avoid a no-show charge.

Cancellations or changes made after 6:00 PM (hotel local time) on Mar 1, 2016 or no-shows are subject to a hotel fee equal to 100% of the total amount paid for the reservation.

If a late check-in is planned, contact this hotel directly for their late check-in policy.

longDescription:
Location: Located in Downtown Las Vegas, this hostel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Little White Wedding Chapel and Las Vegas Premium Outlets. Las Vegas Convention Center and Fashion Show Mall are also within 3 mi (5 km).

Property Features: A computer station, barbecue grills, and a picnic area are available at this hostel. WiFi in public areas is free. Other amenities include a TV in the lobby and ATM/banking services.

Room Amenities: All 22 rooms offer free WiFi.

Rooms
Hostel Cat offers 22 accommodations. This Las Vegas hostel provides complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access. Guests can make use of the shared/communal kitchen.

Fees

  • The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Early check-in fee: USD 3.00
    • Late check-out fee: USD 10.00
    • Onsite credit card charges are subject to a surcharge
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Property Amenities
Hostel Cat features barbecue grills, a picnic area, and ATM/banking services. A computer station is located on site and high-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary.

  • Total number of rooms - 22
  • Number of floors - 1
  • ATM/banking
  • Barbecue grill(s)
  • Front desk (limited hours)
  • Free WiFi
  • Computer station
  • Picnic area
  • Luggage storage
  • Television in common areas

Room Amenities

  • Free WiFi
  • Shared/communal kitchen

Points of Interest

  • Little White Wedding Chapel - 0.1 km / 0 mi
  • Arts Factory - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
  • Las Vegas Premium Outlets - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
  • World Market Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
  • Smith Center for the Performing Arts - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
  • Fremont Street Experience - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
  • Fremont Street Flightlinez - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
  • Mob Museum - 2 km / 1.3 mi
  • Las Vegas City Hall - 2 km / 1.3 mi
  • Las Vegas Country Club - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
  • Las Vegas Convention Center - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
  • Neon Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
  • Las Vegas Library - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
  • Discovery Children's Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
  • Las Vegas Natural History Museum - 3 km / 1.9 mi
The preferred airport for Hostel Cat is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi. Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

Policies

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
    • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
  • Check-in time starts at 2 PM
  • Check-in time ends at 1 AM
  • Minimum check-in age is 18
  • Minimum guest age is 18
  • Check-out time is 11 AM
  • Pets not allowed
  • Caters to adults only
  • No rollaway/extra beds available
  • No cribs (infant beds) available
  • Noise-free rooms not guaranteed
  • MasterCard
  • Visa
  • Bookings with invalid cards/insufficient funds will be cancelled immediately.
  • Any cancellation with 48 hours of the arrival date will result in a charge of the first night plus a USD5 processing fee.
  • This property's private rooms are dorm rooms reserved for a single reservation, with a private bathroom in room.

hotelMandatoryFeesText.name: Mandatory Fees and Taxes
hotelMandatoryFeesText.content:
• You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:
    • Deposit: USD 10.00 per stay
    • Resort fee: USD 3.00 per person, per night
  • The hotel resort fee includes:
    • Internet access
    • Laundry facilities
    • Self parking
    • Parking
    • Housekeeping/cleaning fees/gratuities
  • We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

hotelOverviewText.content: A computer station, barbecue grills, and a picnic area are available at this hostel. WiFi in public areas is free. Other amenities include a TV in the lobby and ATM/banking services.
